body: LEAD: The diners, motor inns and gas stations that front the Sunrise Highway here have an unlikely new neighbor: luxury town houses. The diners, motor inns and gas stations that front the Sunrise Highway here have an unlikely new neighbor: luxury town houses. Forty-two two-story co-ops ranging in price from $255,000 to $285,000 are nearly finished,
title: THE TALK OF SUNRISE HIGHWAY; On the Highway: A Blend of Progress and Tradition
